TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinkTagHelper extends Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.TagHelpers.UrlResolutionTagHelper

Docs.summary: implementation targeting <link> elements that supports fallback href paths.
Docs.remarks: The tag helper won't process for cases with just the 'href' attribute.

Docs.summary: Value indicating if file version should be appended to the href urls.
Docs.remarks: If true then a query string "v" with the encoded content of the file is added.
